thread.title: Weekend trip
thread.title_full: Weekend trip - Review of Hotel 65, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: jadescally
title: Weekend trip
text: Stayed here with two friends and really enjoyed out stay, the rooms are nice and clean and the beds are comfy. The breakfast was croissants , toast, jam,butter and muffins and cheese and hot drinks and orange juice which was grand by us. The location is good, the only thing I would say is that check in is at 3 would be nice if it was earlier as we had an early flight and wanted to settle in our room but had to walk around until check in time. I am staying here again in July with my boyfriend as everything else was good .
